project.project-p: These are the last projects I worked on

about.about-description: I am a Fullstack Developer who enjoys designing and implementing web interfaces with interactivity, as well as optimizing them for good positioning and loading performance of websites and applications. I have experience in both frontend and backend development, being considered a Full-stack JS developer. I also have experience in backend development using the GO language, Content Marketing, SEO, and Game Development.

contact.contact-nameError: Name must be from 3 to 20 digits and can only contain letters
contact.contact-lastnameError: Last name must be from 3 to 20 digits and can only contain letters
contact.contact-emailError: Email can only contain letters, numbers, points, hyphens and underscores
contact.contact-numberError: Phone number must be from 7 to 12 digits and can only contain numbers
